Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.abqparksservice.controller.UserController

  • @RestController
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=User.class)
 @RequestMapping(value="/users")
public class UserController
extends Object
    This is the user REST controller.
